_doc: Semantic Actions Schema - Extracted from hybrid_events.json

extraction_flow.1_parse: Parse hybrid_events.json containing rrweb + custom events
extraction_flow.2_build_registry: Build DOM node registry from rrweb FullSnapshot (type=2)
extraction_flow.3_extract_navigation: Extract 'navigate' actions from rrweb Meta events (type=4) with href
extraction_flow.4_extract_rrweb_incremental: Extract actions from rrweb Incremental events (type=3)
extraction_flow.5_extract_custom: Extract actions from custom events (click, input, keydown, scroll)
extraction_flow.6_post_process: Deduplicate, debounce inputs, enrich selectors, filter low-value

rrweb_event_types.2: FullSnapshot - complete DOM tree (used for node registry)
rrweb_event_types.4: Meta - contains href URL, viewport size (used for navigation)

rrweb_incremental_sources.0_Mutation: DOM mutations (adds/removes) - NOT directly used, builds registry
rrweb_incremental_sources.2_MouseInteraction: Clicks, dblclick, rightclick, focus, blur → ACTIONS
rrweb_incremental_sources.3_Scroll: Scroll events - filtered (low value for automation)
rrweb_incremental_sources.7_MediaInteraction: Video/audio play, pause, seek → MEDIA actions

custom_event_types.keydown: Key press → ActionKeypress (or copy/paste/cut with modifiers)

action_types.navigate: Navigate to URL (from rrweb meta href)
action_types.click: Single click (from custom or rrweb MouseInteraction)
action_types.input: Type text (from custom or rrweb Input)

interaction_ranks.High: button, a, input, select, textarea, navigate, click, dblclick, input
interaction_ranks.Medium: div/span/li with button/btn/click in selector, focus, drag, select, media
